Place Choices.js assets here for local hosting:

Required files:
- choices.min.css
- choices.min.js

Recommended source:
- https://github.com/Choices-js/Choices (dist in releases)
- Or copy from jsDelivr: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/choices.js/public/assets/

After placing the files, layout_main.php will prefer local assets automatically.
